title: jaybitron
author: jaybitron
created_time: December 31, 2022, 07:34:13 AMLast edit: February 19, 2025, 11:08:11 PM by jaybitron
content: Name: LyncoinTicker: LCNSymbol: ⱠChain Type: AUXPoWAlgorithm: FlexWebsite: https://lyncoin.com/Whitepaper: https://lyncoin.com/lyncoin_whitepaper.pdfSource Code: https://github.com/lyncoin/lyncoin/Wallets: https://github.com/lyncoin/lyncoin/releasesExplorer: https://lcnxp.com/Richlist: https://lcnxp.com/richlist/Exchanges: https://lyncoin.com/exchanges/Premine: 0Max supply: 91BDecimals: 8Block Time: 1 MinuteHalving: Not Halving, reduced by 1% every 43200 blocks (30 days)Retarget: Every blockTwitter: https://twitter.com/lyncoin1Discord: https://discord.gg/UNJFYkz2a2Telegram Channel: https://t.me/lyncoinchannelTelegram Group: https://t.me/lyncoingroupReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/lyncoin/Pool Stats: https://miningpoolstats.stream/lyncoinLiveCoinWatch: https://www.livecoinwatch.com/price/Lyncoin-LCNCoinCodex: https://coincodex.com/crypto/lyncoin/BlockSpot: https://blockspot.io/coin/lyncoin/

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: How to mine this stuff? The pool mining seems to work only with rental.

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.body: Quote from: thikachhey on January 01, 2023, 08:51:14 AMHow to mine this stuff? The pool mining seems to work only with rental.It does not. it works with any mining software, cpu, gpu, asic, rental, owned, everything.If you have Nvidia GPU on your computer, download your preferred ccminer and run it like thisCode:ccminer -a sha256 -o stratum+tcp://eu.mpool.live:5205 -u LCN=<your wallet> -p d=<your preferred difficulty>

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: If anyone doesn't want to mine bitcoin/namecoin and only provides the LNC address, will the full mining power be on LynCoin?

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.body: Quote from: thikachhey on January 01, 2023, 11:05:33 AMIf anyone doesn't want to mine bitcoin/namecoin and only provides the LNC address, will the full mining power be on LynCoin?Look up how merged mining a.k.a auxpow works, it doesn't matter how many coins you mine, you'll not loose any hash power, so why not mine more coins? mpool.live has never mined a bitcoin or namecoin, but if a block founds, you also will be paid with bitcoin and/or namecoin.

comments.author: jharris9931
comments.body: Any other mining pool? I'm in the US and eu.mpool.live only has servers in EU.

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.body: Quote from: jharris9931 on January 01, 2023, 01:31:16 PMAny other mining pool? I'm in the US and eu.mpool.live only has servers in EU. it can be added by other mining pools, not sure when.

comments.author: jharris9931
comments.body: Is your server having issues?https://miningpoolstats.stream/lyncoinSays API error and 0 hashrate.

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.body: Quote from: jharris9931 on January 02, 2023, 02:24:52 PMIs your server having issues?https://miningpoolstats.stream/lyncoinSays API error and 0 hashrate.Because it says LNC which is the wrong ticker

comments.author: Bialke
comments.body: I think this coin is worth a second view. You can mine two coins with the same hash power - LCN is a great idea! It needs just a little push.

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: Explorer dead.Website dead.Github has no release for v3.1.0 as it points to the dead website...And you wonder why the price is 50 digits to the right? I hate defunct devs. They give crypto a BAD name. It will be off xeggex in no time.

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.created_time: February 19, 2025, 08:17:05 PMLast edit: February 20, 2025, 10:17:09 AM by jaybitron
comments.body: Lyncoin (LCN) is now officially integrated into the Komodo Wallet!This integration leverages the Electrum servers we previously introduced, ensuring secure and efficient transactions.The Komodo Wallet is officially available at https://app.komodoplatform.com/wallet, and desktop versions can be downloaded from https://downloads.f1ex.org/komodo-wallet-desktop/.The wallet supports both LCN’s mainnet and its Binance Smart Chain (BSC) contract, giving users flexibility in managing their tokens.

comments.author: jaybitron
comments.body: Lyncoin Core version 4.0.0 is now available from:https://downloads.lyncoin.com/lyncoin-core/4.0.0/For the release notes please see the git repository:https://github.com/lyncoin/lyncoin/blob/master/doc/release-notes/release-notes-4.0.0.md
